EmailTemplate.name: RE: Payment of Subcontractors Through Elance (1381263322.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Payment of Subcontractors Through Elance (1381263322.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Nick, Long time no talk; I hope you are doing well. I understand you want to schedule a call to pick up where we left off. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to speaking with you again! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, June 24, 2013 12:02 PM To: 'OnBehalf, Nick Vaidya' Subject: RE: Payment of Subcontractors Through Elance Thanks Nick – sounds good! ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: OnBehalf, Nick Vaidya [mailto:nick@8020strategy.com <mailto:nick@8020strategy.com>] Sent: Saturday, June 22, 2013 11:28 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Payment of Subcontractors Through Elance Hi Sara, I have returned but have killed my revenue generating activities in favor in investing full time in the magazine. As soon as I get started with my new type of sales, I will get back in touch with you. Knowing this is very helpful. Regards,
Nick Vaidya, Managing Editor | The CEO Magazine <http://www.the-ceo-magazine.com/> o (512) 257-7868 | m (512) 680-1910 | f (512) 257-7869 | nick@the-ceo-magazine.com <mailto:Nick@8020Strategy.Com> ........................................................................................................................ Introducing The Next Generation of Journalism, Education, And Business ........................................................................................................................ For Audio Conference: Access Number is 1-218-862-9365 / Passcode is 6425#For Video Conference: gaoceo.megameeting.com <http://gaoceo.megameeting.com/> / ID is 8020 On Tue, Apr 2, 2013 at 5:00 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Nick, It was so nice speaking with you today. As discussed, I escalated this issue to my boss (who is our C.E.O.) and because we would love to have your business we are willing to entertain the idea of making an exception to our rule for you. But first, I need a little more information: · In the last 90 days what is the amount of money you paid for contractors to Elance? In other words, are we talking a few thousand a month, or more in the range of 20k per month etc.? · Are the workers US workers for foreign workers? Also, just an FYI Elance has legal language in their agreements stating that they are simply a pass-through firm and have no responsibility for IRS penalties and fines, so there really is no protection here. They do provide a wonderful convenience but I don’t want you under any illusion that they are protecting you from tax risk. This is why paying subcontractors is not something that is typically allowed as an expense write off through us. At the end of the day, the risk would fall the entity who claimed this expense on their corporate or personal return. I am really hoping we can make this work. Looking forward to hearing from you. Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdVhavmcuu67JMb3%2FniHFfYHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdVhavmcuu67JMb3%2FniHFfYHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdVhavmcuu67JMb3%2FniHFfYHmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
